title: 1-Bedroom Apartment (12-Month Lease starting 6/23/2023)
description:
Looking for someone to take over a lease for a 1-bedroom/1-bathroom apartment in University City (Philadelphia). The term will be 12 months from the new start date of 6/23/2023.
The apartment has 9-foot ceilings, modern cabinetry/countertops, fridge/electric oven/microwave/dishwasher, high-efficiency HVAC, solid-surface flooring, bedroom ceiling fan, large windows, and an open floor-plan. The unit is located towards the middle of the building, resulting in major savings on cooling and heating costs. It also gets plenty of sunlight and has a great view outside with lots of pleasant greenery.
The building is <5 years old and ideally situated within walking distance from Penn's campus (~7 minutes from the dental and veterinary schools), Acme grocery store (~9 minutes), Supremo Food Market (~10 minutes), USPS (~7 minutes), multiple coffee shops and restaurants, 40th Street Trolley Portal (~3 minutes) and multiple bus and trolley stops, Clark Park (~4 minutes, home to a weekly farmer's market), and The Woodlands (~13 minutes, a historic garden and cemetery that is walkable and hosts community events).
Building amenities:
Free WiFi, elevator, laundry room on every floor with card-operated washers and dryers and space for bicycle storage, video surveillance throughout, parcel locker (outside building for a fee or packages can be received by leasing office just steps away for fee), parking (under building for a fee or on the street for free), and water and trash removal provided by landlord.
3-D apartment tour:
- my.matterport.com/show/?m=bhpE3HZaNzx
Length of lease:
- 12 months starting 6/23/2023
Renter requirements and move-in costs:
- $50 non-refundable application fee
- Minimum 625 credit score with no prior evictions
- If you do not have a reported score, proof of attendance at a local university can be used
- First month's rent, last month's rent, and one-month security deposit, with first month pro-rated based on number of days left in month when lease begins
- Proof of income (net approximately 3x rent/month)
- Co-signers/guarantors allowed on an approval basis
- Insurance charges for first month ($12.50) due upon lease signing
- Rent and insurance charges will recur monthly thereafter

title: 2 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath Rowhome for Rent in Graduate Hospital
description:
Available August 1st, 2023.
Great 2 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom house with a private, renovated backyard (includes patio furniture). The house has central air, hardwood floors, newer kitchen with garbage disposal, stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher), granite counters & gas cooking. The 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom are on the second floor and the powder room is on the first floor. The bathrooms are renovated and the house also features a full, unfinished basement with washer & dryer -- great for storage.
Beautiful center city location in the Graduate Hospital area, the house is located on a small, quiet block just off of Bainbridge Street. It is just a few minutes' walk from Rittenhouse Square, Fitler Square, the Italian Market, Reading Terminal Market, City Hall, Jefferson Hospital and walking distance from CHOP, University City (Penn/Drexel). The house is only a few blocks away from the subway (Broad Street line) and just a block away from restaurants, bars, cafes and shops on South Street West!
Permit parking on the street for $35/year.

description:

Extraordinary total renovation, cherry flooring, custom/recessed lighting, open kitchen with contemporary, shaker-style cabinetry, stainless steel appliance suite, tiled backsplash, and natural stone counters opens to living/dining space with custom built-ins.
